channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: Japanese food tech products such as soybean-based meat substitutes are made using new technology. Land-based aquaculture and 3D food printing are also in the spotlight. We look at the latest products.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 23, Day 11 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Through the use of personal alarms and community policing, Sakurai Masayoshi aims to reduce sexual violence in underprivileged areas. So far, he has provided support to 15,000 women in India.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life(4)
channel.desc: With its splendid branches and white plum blossoms, this famous painting is known for captivating Van Gogh. Discover why people were able to tell this was a specific tree at Kameido Umeyashiki.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #40 Since it was my first earthquake, I was startled. / To explain the reason for your action, say the reason followed by the particle "kara," then the action.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: History Of A Traditional Fabric
channel.desc: Yamanashi / Shibata Fumie (product designer) "Kaiki" is a thin, brightly colored silk fabric. Shibata discovers how threads are arranged to produce a layered effect that resembles a digital image.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Railway Journal
channel.desc: Despite the rise of transfer apps, around 100,000 timetables are printed each month. Discover the charm of Japanese train timetables as we speak to the editors and the foreign residents who use them.

channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: Australia's "worst-ever" wildfires in 2019 had a devastating impact on endangered species, including koalas. We examine the cause of these fires and explore ways to minimize future catastrophes.

channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Crafts, fashion, products, buildings, and food: explore a diverse range of Japanese designs and the ideas and values of their creators. Our presenters visit designers at work to reveal new stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: During Syria's 13-year civil war, more than 100,000 people are thought to have disappeared. In the aftermath of conflict, families are seeking truth, justice, and hope for the future.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: New research results have revealed that resetting a disrupted body clock can improve sleep. We introduce a hospital that offers clock-resetting treatments and share dietary tips for better sleep.

channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A young man from Vietnam is using his own struggles finding an apartment in Japan to help other foreigners get settled. If you're new to Japan and faced similar challenges, tell us.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Featured recipe: Cherry Blossom-shaped Crab Rice/ Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Crafts, fashion, products, buildings, and food: explore a diverse range of Japanese designs and the ideas and values of their creators. Our presenters visit designers at work to reveal new stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land
channel.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Good Or Evil Soul
channel.desc: We visit the Yoshiwara district, Edo's most prominent pleasure quarters. Among the lavish spenders, courtesans and apprentices, small humanoid creatures scurry about - what could they be up to.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Budo Secrets
channel.desc: "Punch"techniques have existed since the dawn of humanity.Today, an Okinawan Karate master and a Muay Thai champion explore its cutting edge.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Tagawa Kinya (Design engineer)investigates the process of design by looking at the work of Yanagi Sori, who shaped products by making models using different materials.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seeds Of Peace: Bright Young Minds On The Path To Nuclear Abolition
channel.desc: The Hiroshima and Nagasaki Peace Messengers visit the United Nations in Geneva each year. We join them as they call for nuclear abolition and see the complexities of global politics in a new light.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Flicks
channel.desc: We introduce Kazuo ISHIGURO's "A Pale View of Hills" and other Japanese films screened at the Cannes Film Festival, as well as the classic "Sansho the Bailiff" by MIZOGUCHI Kenji.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Live
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN will broadcast GRAND SUMO July Tournament Day 14 action live from Nagoya, as top wrestlers have their fourteenth bouts of the 15-day contest.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Crafts, fashion, products, buildings, and food: explore a diverse range of Japanese designs and the ideas and values of their creators. Our presenters visit designers at work to reveal new stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land
channel.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Professionals
channel.desc: Honda Tsuneyuki has changed the concept of capsule toys, developing numerous mega-hits. We see behind the scenes of development, and a new challenge to create an unprecedentedly large capsule toy.

channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-17.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: In the Western-influenced port town of Kobe, a kitty seeks attention while its owner makes shoes at a custom shop. You'll meet a popular shopping district kitty that has its own designer T-shirt.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Anime Manga Explosion
channel.desc: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION features major Japanese anime and manga works that are highly recognized by international fans. Each episode explores the secrets of the works' popularity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 26, Day 14 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Fish that overconsume seaweed, often called pests. A strong odor also makes them hard to sell. Kanazawa Ryuji uses these to make a distinctive fish sauce, so that no life from the sea goes to waste.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Why Did My Husband Die?: Unsealing The Secrets Of Radiation Exposure
channel.desc: Japanese people were exposed to nuclear radiation in the bombings at the end of World War Two, and US nuclear tests at Bikini Atoll. But the facts about another exposure are only now being revealed.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Japan has 9 million vacant homes. We investigate the issue of vacant homes in Japan and see how they're being used creatively to promote population growth and regional revitalization.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kaizoku: Noshima Island
channel.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Fish that overconsume seaweed, often called pests. A strong odor also makes them hard to sell. Kanazawa Ryuji uses these to make a distinctive fish sauce, so that no life from the sea goes to waste.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Why Did My Husband Die?: Unsealing The Secrets Of Radiation Exposure
channel.desc: Japanese people were exposed to nuclear radiation in the bombings at the end of World War Two, and US nuclear tests at Bikini Atoll. But the facts about another exposure are only now being revealed.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Searching For The Standing Boy Of Nagasaki
channel.desc: Who is the boy who waits stoically to cremate his dead brother in Nagasaki? The search for his identity continues, as the iconic image has come to symbolize the fate of "atomic-bomb orphans.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Anime Manga Explosion
channel.desc: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION features major Japanese anime and manga works that are highly recognized by international fans. Each episode explores the secrets of the works' popularity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Tiny Desk Concerts Japan
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Japan has 9 million vacant homes. We investigate the issue of vacant homes in Japan and see how they're being used creatively to promote population growth and regional revitalization.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Fish that overconsume seaweed, often called pests. A strong odor also makes them hard to sell. Kanazawa Ryuji uses these to make a distinctive fish sauce, so that no life from the sea goes to waste.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from ( ), Day ( ) of the Grand Sumo Tournament in ( ).

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Nakahara Sachiko translates the looks of popular Japanese anime and manga characters into costumes for live-action adaptations. She talks about making an impact on the global stage.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Japan has a long history of natural disasters. BOSAI explores how to overcome them and save lives with the power of science.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #44 I've heard he's giving another recital. / To tell someone what you heard from someone else, use adjectives or verbs without "masu" or "desu," then add "soo desu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: August marks 80 years since WW2's end. NHK will run a special feature on Hiroshima & Nagasaki, with programs about war and peace, and a website called "The Pursuit of PEACE: Searching for Answers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: Kir's life reads like a novel: low-ranking male macaque shunned by the ladies and bullied by those around him gets a new chance in a neighboring troop. Does a reversal of fortune lie on the horizon.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from ( ), Day ( ) of the Grand Sumo Tournament in ( ).

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: Kir's life reads like a novel: low-ranking male macaque shunned by the ladies and bullied by those around him gets a new chance in a neighboring troop. Does a reversal of fortune lie on the horizon.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 1000 Japanese have experience as a lay judge in court cases. We witness a networking event for former lay judges, where they discuss unique experiences. What does it feel like to judge others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: The Piercing Gaze
channel.desc: A man strikes a pose in an iconic woodblock print by the artist Sharaku. Who is the mysterious figure... and what is he doing? And why did the artist want to commemorate the moment.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to horses. Explore the unique culture behind them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Culture Crossroads comprises several regular programs with the theme of creating a multicultural society. They look at international exchange programs and give tips on disaster preparedness.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: iPS cells are being used to treat eye diseases to address donor shortages. We explore advancements made in Japan, such as the transplantation of iPS cell-derived corneal cells and retinal sheets.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: People from around the globe who put down roots in Japan offer a glimpse into their lives and the hardships they face in Japanese society.
